page_title: DT 700 PRO X 48 Ohm Professional Monitoring Headphone

specs.label: Nominal SPL
specs.value: 100 dB SPL (1 mW/500 Hz); 114 dB SPL (1 V/500 Hz)

specs.label: Connection
specs.value: Gold-plated mini stereo jack (3.5 mm) and adapter 6.35 mm

specs.label: Length and type of cable
specs.value: 3 m / straight cable; 1.8 m / straight cable; each detachable, with 3-pin mini XLR cable connector, single-sided

specs.label: Included accessories
specs.value: 1.8 m cable; 3 m cable; 6.35 mm adapter; drawstring bag
